import React, { Component } from "react"; import olinCounts from "./imgs/olinCounts.png"; import Calendar from "./Calendar"; import { render } from "react-dom"; function newCountDisplay() { document.getElementById("mainContent").innerHTML = ""; document.getElementById("mainContent").insertAdjacentHTML("beforeend", `

`); } function time() { let time = new Date(); let timeString = `${time.getHours()}:${time.getMinutes()}` console.log(time); return time.toLocaleTimeString(); } class Home extends Component { render() { return ( <>
Current Time
{time()}

CALENDAR

Latest Counts
Busiest Rooms
); } } export default Home;
